author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Economic Offences Wing police has been reaching out to college students with its awareness programmes on safe investment.

During this week, the EOW has covered three colleges: Chikkiah Naicker College in Erode, Bannari Amman Institute of Technology in Sathyamangalam and Aishwarya College of Engineering and Technology near Anthiyur to sensitise hundreds of students to the frauds indulged in by a section of unscrupulous companies.

Students were told about how companies had, in the past, cheated gullible investors through floating fraudulent schemes for investments.

The students were asked to caution their family members, relatives and neighbours against losing their hard-earned money to fraudsters, and to avail themselves of the utility of IVRS (Interactive Voice Response System) number: 044 64500155 for guidance on investments.
title: Students sensitised
